pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to Abbyy Optical Character Recognition (OCR) API // Get text from images of text using Abbyy Cloud Optical Character Recognition (OCR) API. Easily OCR images, barcodes, forms, documents with machine readable zones, e.g. passports. Get the results in a variety of formats including plain text and XML. To learn more about the Abbyy OCR API, see http://ocrsdk.com/.
